sentences: Ancient Greek art saw the <<||>> of the animal form and the development of equivalent skills to <<||>> musculature, poise, beauty and anatomically correct proportions. <<||>> Roman art depicted gods as idealized humans, shown with characteristic distinguishing <<||>>. In Byzantine and Gothic art of the Middle Ages, the dominance of the church <<||>> on the expression of biblical and not material truths. Eastern art has generally worked in a style akin to Western medieval art, namely a concentration on surface patterning and local colour. A characteristic of this style is that the local colour is often defined by an outline. This is <<||>> in, for example, the art of India, Tibet and Japan. Religious Islamic art forbids iconography, and <<||>> religious ideas through geometry instead. The physical and <<||>> certainties depicted by the 19th-century Enlightenment were shattered not only by new discoveries of relativity by <<||>> and of unseen psychology by Freud, but also by <<||>> technological development. Paradoxically the expressions of new technologies were <<||>> influenced by the ancient tribal arts of Africa and Oceania, through the works of Paul Gauguin and the Post-Impressionists, Pablo Picasso and the Cubists, as well as the Futurists and others.
